snippet: The unrest that has shaken Thailand since November is taking a potentially lasting toll on the country’s economy, just when regional growth over all is facing headwinds.
lead_paragraph: The unrest that has shaken Thailand since November is taking a potentially lasting toll on the country’s economy, just when regional growth over all is facing headwinds.

headline.main: Economic Growth in Thailand Cools to 0.6%
headline.print_headline: Economic Growth in Thailand Cools to 0.6%
